name: test-wasm-calling-ts-function
description: Test wasm calling a TypeScript function
author: Wink Saville <wink@saville.com>

scripts.build:tsc: tsc -p lib/utils.tsconfig.json && tsc -p lib/tsconfig.json && tsc -p src/print_i32.tsconfig.json
scripts.test: node build/print_i32.js && node build/rand0_1.js && node build/e_exp.js
